keyMoments.title: Blackbeard Pirates Invade Impel Down
keyMoments.description: The Blackbeard Pirates arrive at Impel Down aboard a hijacked Marine ship and use Blackbeard's Devil Fruit powers to breach the prison entrance.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of the crew's plan to recruit powerful criminals from Level 6 of Impel Down, a pivotal moment in their rise to power.

keyMoments.title: Hijacked Marine Ship Revealed
keyMoments.description: It's revealed that the Blackbeard Pirates hijacked a Marine ship and murdered the crew to approach Impel Down.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's ruthless tactics and strategic planning.

keyMoments.title: Blackbeard's Betrayal of Warlord Position
keyMoments.description: The Marines learn that Blackbeard has abandoned his position as a Warlord of the Sea.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's willingness to betray any alliance for their own ambitions, foreshadowing their future as a Yonko crew.
